ONE.NAME: Victoria Bech
ONE.TEXT:
I am a certified elementary school, crafts, and home economics teacher, philologist, and a teacher of Russian language and literature.
My teaching experience began in a Russian school, where I worked for 16 years. In Denmark, I have been teaching for 13 years at a Saturday school for Russian-speaking bilingual children. I worked for 12 years at a school affiliated with the Russian Center for Science and Culture in Copenhagen, and since 2023, I have opened the STARTUM club-school with a group of like-minded individuals, where I work as an administrator.
We educate children on language and culture, creating a language environment for communication and organizing social events.
For the past 3 years, I have been preparing students from Birker√∏d Gymnasie for Russian literature exams at IB1 and IB2 levels with excellent results
ONE.CITE: Mastery of the language at the native level is possible, which I can confirm as both a teacher and a mother of two children  üë©‚Äçüëß‚Äçüë¶

TWO.NAME: Victoria Burtseva
TWO.TEXT:
Hello! I'm an artist, illustrator, and graphic designer.
I graduated from the Moscow Stroganov State University of Arts and Industry with additional education in illustration and graphic design. I have been working as a graphic designer for over 5 years, and I also teach workshops on drawing and painting. Since 2024, I have been working at the Startum school.
In my classes, children learn to draw, get acquainted with artists, and study various techniques. Drawing develops fine motor skills, attention, creativity, and helps to manage emotions.
TWO.CITE: I'm looking forward to seeing everyone at the courses "Graphic Design for Kids" and "Drawing", where we will be learning about creating logos and branding! ‚ù§Ô∏è

THREE.NAME: Iuliia Andrushko
THREE.TEXT:
Hello everyone! I am a teacher of Russian language and literature, a candidate of philological sciences, a graduate of Chelyabinsk State Pedagogical University. I worked as a Russian language teacher in a college for 12 years, being engaged in educational work and preparing students for scientific and creative competitions.
In 2024, I completed the "Playful Reading" course and studied the peculiarities of working with young children.
I also completed the "Leader of Children's Theater Group" course and led a theater group for children aged 6 to 12 for 8 years.
I am passionate about dancing and drawing, and I am raising a 7-year-old son. In 2023, my family moved to Copenhagen.
I have been working at the "Startum" club since 2023.
THREE.CITE: During my lessons, I combine traditional and playful forms to make the classes not only educational but also engaging for children üé≠

PROCESS.HEADER: The learning process at our school

ONE.HEADER: Discover the joy of learning with us
ONE.TEXT: At our school, we incorporate playful elements, a creative approach, and academic knowledge into learning, encouraging children to actively participate. We foster a friendly atmosphere where every child feels comfortable and confident

TWO.TEXT: Come and join our classes. Participate in international competitions and olympiads with us

FEEDBACK.TEXT: Come and try one or several different classes üôÇ

ONE.TEXT: Both of my children attend this school and always come home in a good mood. I like the discount system for families, it makes education accessible for us. We are happy to have found such a wonderful school!

TWO.TEXT: My husband, Mikhail, and I are very pleased that all our children attend this school. Our third child attends for free. Our Saturdays are productive, and the children really enjoy it here

THREE.TEXT: Excellent school! Alice gladly attends all the lessons. We really like that not only knowledge is given here, but also children's creative thinking is developed. Thanks to the teachers for their hard work and care!

ONE.TEXT1: Opening and closing of the school season

TWO.TEXT: Our school picnics provide a wonderful opportunity for students and their families to spend time together. The program includes sports games, contests, and creative workshops, so that everyone can find an activity they enjoy

THREE.TEXT: At our school, we regularly hold chess tournaments, giving students the opportunity to demonstrate their skills and develop strategic thinking in a friendly atmosphere.

FOUR.TEXT: At our school, we have active breaks between classes, where students can relax and recharge their energy through active games and exercises
